title: Fara F/GR gravel road bike takes QR integrated bikepacking tech off tarmac
content:
The new carbon Fara F/GR gravel bike is the almost obvious extension of the Norwegian bike companyâ€™s adventure bikepacking line-up. Their third bike to feature magnetic quick-release, integrated bikepacking bags, the new F/GR gravel road bike is meant to open up any remaining hard surface track for exploration with 50mm tire clearance and quick all-terrain

author: Cory Benson
